nodes.text: Redris Korin was a male Human who served as member of the Green Jedi during the time of the Cold War and the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire. In 3640 BBY, he was killed alongside fellow Green Jedi Jacus Redick during the battle on Corellia.

Redris Korin appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Corellia. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
